name: FinalProject (SantosM97)
description:
The game is about a farmer that can't control his cows and horses, so the solution that he makes is to kill them all, help him doing the job and don't let the animals escape frome the farm, ¡Kill them all!

How to play? The only thing that you need to do is to move forward the farmer to both sides and shoot the bananas that he has to kill the animals, it's a very easy gameplay, if some animal escape, you lose.

The game was developed in Unity and it's the first game that we create, so it has errors but we're going to fix everything in the future, this is the Beta from the game.

Also this game it's for our class of "Computer Simulation", so that's the only reason why we make this game.

It's like a game that for sure you already play, but give us a chance please.

All the credits to the Unity Students Platform for helping us in the development of this game.
